item.title: Billy Joel Sits Down With Bill Maher for Post-Brain Disorder Diagnosis Interview
item.description: The “Piano Man” singer is set to appear on the ‘Club Random’ podcast next week, with a video clip from the interview released on Friday.

item.title: Billy Joel Sits Down With Bill Maher for Post-Brain Disorder Diagnosis Interview
item.description: The “Piano Man” singer is set to appear on the ‘Club Random’ podcast next week, with a video clip from the interview released on Friday.

item.title: Billy Joel ‘And So It Goes’ Directors On “Vienna,” Nas and the One Legendary Artist Who Turned Down an Interview for the Doc
item.description: “At one point, [Billy] said to me, ‘You going deep?’ And I said, ‘Yeah, and you know you’re going to go deep too,’" the film’s co-director Susan Lacy says.

item.title: Billy Joel ‘And So It Goes’ Directors On “Vienna,” Nas and the One Legendary Artist Who Turned Down an Interview for the Doc
item.description: “At one point, [Billy] said to me, ‘You going deep?’ And I said, ‘Yeah, and you know you’re going to go deep too,’" the film’s co-director Susan Lacy says.

item.title: Billy Joel HBO Documentary Trailer Highlights Classical Music to “Uptown Girl” Journey Amid “Hard Lessons”: “Life Is a Fight”
item.description: The two-part expansive portrait of the iconic musician, ‘And So It Goes’ will air across two weeks later this month, clocking in at a total of five hours, and features interviews with Joel, his friend
